name: Wasteland Gossip
description:
Wasteland Gossip - text quest with RPG elements in the setting of the post-apocalyptic world. The main character needs to survive 4 days in a bar full of colorful characters. Nobody knows what's in their head, so be extremely careful in conversations. Here [sarcasm] does not help, only logic and your intuition.

Features:

  • Characters.
    People from all over the wasteland with their own characteristics and preferences. The grains of humanity they still have, but do not be too naive - in the post-nuclear world each for himself.

  • RPG system.
    Create your character yourself. Who will it be? A charming womanizer, a greedy nerd, an alcoholic thug? The choice of characteristics and features directly affects the course of the game.

  • Endings.
    In the game, 15 different endings are possible, for the opening of which a certain confluence of game circumstances is necessary.

  • Mini-games.
    The opportunity to have fun and earn some in-game money. Just do not spend everything on drink!
    Alcohol, venereal diseases, slave labor, violence and gambling - in 4 days you can catch everything!
